[![San Saba logo](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/cropped-Logo-CITY-SS-2017-Cap-Pecan-Capital-1-1-1.png)](https://sansabatexas.com/)




Toggle Menu




The Economic Development Commission (EDC) is comprised of a network of business leaders to drive economic development in the city of San Saba. The EDC values its partnership with community groups and citizens in setting goals for the community’s future with city government as a leading force in achieving these goals.

![](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/council-chambers-1-1024x634.jpg)

*For additional information, phone 325.372.5200 or email
**[SanSabaEDC@gmail.com](mailto:SanSabaEDC@gmail.com)**
.*
